long_description: Haul gear, clothes and especially groceries in the wide REI reusable tote and successfully dodge the supermarket question, "Paper or plastic?''. Double webbing handles offer carrying options: The long handles fit over your shoulder, and the short handles let you carry the bag at your side. Empty bag stands on its own for convenient loading. Woven polypropylene is lightweight, yet highly durable to withstand everyday use.
short_description: Haul gear, clothes and especially groceries in the wide REI reusable tote and successfully dodge the supermarket question, "Paper or plastic?''.
